metadata.title: CVE-2023-52532 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: mana: Fix TX CQE error handlingFor an unknown TX CQE error type (probably from a newer hardware),still free the SKB, update the queue tail, etc., otherwise theaccounting will be wrong.Also, TX errors can be triggered by injecting corrupted packets, soreplace the WARN_ONCE to ratelimited error logging.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
